UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: New perspectives for natural antimicrobial peptides: application as antinflammatory drugs in a murine model.
Literature.Author: Capuano F, Blaiotta G, Avitabile C, Romanelli A, Fulgione A, Iannaccone M, Montella RC, Nocerino N, De Chiara F, Capparelli R
Capparelli R, Romanelli A, Iannaccone M, Nocerino N, Ripa R, Pensato S, Pedone C, Iannelli D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=7µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus A170(MIC=20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus A172(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 007(MIC=10µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=10µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A(MIC=20µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=20µg/ml)
